title: non-robust access to S3 -- needs a freshier boto (2.43, not 2.38)
body:
just a note:  some times works, some times pukes authentication error:
```shell
$> datalad ls s3://openfmri/ds117/sub002/MEG/run_01_sss.fif
Connecting to bucket: openfmri
[INFO   ] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket openfmri 
Authentication to access s3://openfmri/ds117/sub002/MEG/run_01_sss.fif has failed
Do you want to enter other credentials in case they were updated? (choices: yes, no): no

[ERROR  ] Failed to download from s3://openfmri/ds117/sub002/MEG/run_01_sss.fif given available credentials [base.py:access:176] (DownloadError) 
Exception TypeError: "'NoneType' object is not callable" in <bound method OSFS.__del__ of <fs.osfs.OSFS object at 0x7fa2166f8a50>> ignored

$> datalad ls s3://openfmri/ds117/sub002/MEG/run_01_sss.fif
Connecting to bucket: openfmri
[INFO   ] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket openfmri 
Bucket info:
  Versioning: S3ResponseError: 403 Forbidden
     Website: S3ResponseError: 403 Forbidden
         ACL: <Policy: openfmri (owner) = READ, openfmri (owner) = WRITE, openfmri (owner) = READ_ACP, openfmri (owner) = WRITE_ACP, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/s3/LogDelivery = WRITE, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/s3/LogDelivery = READ_ACP, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers = READ, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers = READ_ACP>
ds117/sub002/MEG/run_01_sss.fif 2014-12-08T19:17:34.000Z 879788831 
Exception TypeError: "'NoneType' object is not callable" in <bound method OSFS.__del__ of <fs.osfs.OSFS object at 0x7f648dc91a50>> ignored
```

boto is
```shell
$> welp boto
PATH       : /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venv-tests/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/boto/__init__.pyc
SRC PATH   : /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venv-tests/lib/python2.7/site-packages/boto/__init__.py
VERSION    : 2.38.0
__version__: '2.38.0'
```

~~~upgrading to 2.43 resolved the issue~~~
actually -- still persists even with boto 2.43 - may be amazon intermittent issue
